channel.title: EurekaCast NOW!
channel.author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark
channel.itunes:author: Dee Eff
channel.description: Where science meets technology, meets you. Inspire curiosity: imagine science.

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 15 EurekaCast NOW! Enlightenment Sculpt
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: This week, we discuss the Enlightenment Sculpt: a new revolutionary tool for wellness developed in collaboration between Tech Brothers and the Simon Amy Institute for Spirit Sciences. Originally Aired: Nov 7, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 14 EurekaCast NOW! Innovate Political Analysis
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: Science and data are inherently apolitical, as we can all agree. But can we use them to optimize the field? Of course we can! Cast your ballot for Science in this simulcast! Originally Aired: Oct 31, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! awcyfm.com/eurekacast
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 13 EurekaCast NOW! Success Stories
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: Sure, we've all heard about the negative impacts that the MALO-21 pandemic has had on small businesses. Now, let's talk about the success stories: the companies that saw this time - this Newer Normal - as an opportunity to invest and innovate. And guess what...it paid off BIGTIME. Originally Aired: Oct 24, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! https://twitter.com/eurekacast
AWCY?-FM - @awcyfm https://twitter.com/AWCYFM https://www.facebook.com/AWCYFM Email us at awcyfm@gmail.com
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 12 EurekaCast NOW! Fiberglass: A Textile for Living
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: LISTENER BE ADVISED! There are dangerous and counter-to-even-basic-common-sense views expressed in this special feature. I will say this once: fiberglass has NOT been tested as a "safe", and "comfortable" material for masks, no matter what you hear from "alternative scientists."
Originally Aired: Oct 17, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! https://twitter.com/eurekacast
AWCY?-FM - @awcyfm https://twitter.com/AWCYFM https://www.facebook.com/AWCYFM Email us at awcyfm@gmail.com
Special thanks to: https://rodydavis.github.io/creative_engineering

item.title: 11 EurekaCast NOW! Tech Brothers Mask PSA
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: Wearing a mask is as important as ever, and the masks designed by Tech Brothers Laboratories are specially designed for optimal immunization. Please do NOT tinker with your mask. You have no idea what you're dealing with.
Originally Aired: Oct 10, 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL

item.author: Kai Hubris
item.itunes:author: Kai Hubris, Rowan Meadowlark, AWCY?-FM
item.title: 6 EurekaCast NOW! guy5...counterpoint
item.description:
The LATEST solutions and innovations in Science, but also Technology. Special Feature: guy5...counterpoint? BEWARE: This particular show provides alternative, possibly harmful viewpoints on technological innovations. The views expressed in this program are antithetical to those of the scientific community at large, and represent a borderline attack on scientific literacy common sense.
Originally Aired: 22 Aug 2020 20:00 - 21:00 CST on WLPN-LP 105.5 FM Lumpen Radio, Chicago IL
EurekaCast NOW! https://twitter.com/eurekacast
